Description: People, households, or micro-businesses trading raw food online.
SMEs selling their own ready-to-cook ingredient boxes online.
Online supermarkets selling their own raw food.
Personal blogs or small websites of artisanal (local produce) Sellers where they can communicate with consumers.
Online forums/listings of actors trading raw food (no booking).
Social media platforms where Sellers market services and communicate with consumers.
Platforms aggregating raw food items from external Sellers.
Platforms aggregating raw food items from external Sellers and facilitating delivery  (involves food handling).
Town-square-like platforms enabling social interaction and (optional) order intermediation between external Sellers and potential buyers.
Town-square-like platforms enabling social interaction and order intermediation and delivery services (involves food handling) between external Sellers and potential buyers.
People, households, or micro-businesses trading food experiences online.
SMEs selling their own mobile food experiences online.
Large-scale catering service providers selling their own services online.
Personal blogs or small websites of artisanal (supper clubs) Sellers where they can communicate with consumers.
Online forums/listings of food experience providers (no booking).
Social media platforms where Sellers market services and communicate with consumers.
Platforms aggregating food experiences/events from external Sellers.
Platforms aggregating food experiences/events from external Sellers and facilitating event management (involves food handling).
Town-square-like platforms enabling social interaction and (optional) order intermediation between external Sellers and potential buyers.
Town-square-like platforms enabling social interaction and order intermediation and delivery services (involves food handling) between external Sellers and potential buyers.
People, households, or micro-businesses trading cooked meals online.
Examples: E.g. Xia, who also cooks and sells tomato soup

Description: SMEs selling their own cooked meals online.
Large restaurant chains selling their own cooked meals online.
Personal blogs or small website of artisanal (home kitchens) Sellers where they can communicate with consumers.
Examples: E.g. Xia, who also cooks and sells tomato soup

Description: Listings of takeaway, restaurant, and cooked meal operators (no booking).
Social media platforms where Sellers market services and communicate with consumers.
Platforms aggregating cooked meals and/or offering booking services of external Sellers.
Platforms aggregating cooked meals and/or offering booking services of external Sellers and facilitating delivery (involves food handling).
Town-square-like platforms enabling social interaction and (optional) order intermediation between external Sellers and potential buyers.
Town-square-like platforms enabling social interaction and order intermediation and delivery services (involves food handling) between external Sellers and potential buyers.
